content.rendered:
Founded in 1991

In 1991 RI Workplace began as Renotech Interiors to provide commercial interior renovation services. In the mid-90's Renotech Interiors began to offer turnkey commercial interior design/build services as a package, including design, construction, millwork, and furniture.

0 +
years in business,
and still growing
0 %
of our business in 2021
was from repeat clients
0 %
of our sales in 2022
were from referrals
0 %
quicker project
turnaround times
In the early 2000's

Renotech Interiors became RI Workplace as we added talent to our team and pursued our mission of creating inspiring workplaces to attract, retain, and motivate top talent to help our clients’ businesses grow and prosper. Today the RI Workplace brand is a symbol of simplifying the complexity of workplace design, while maintaining the integrity of the mission and values that our team has always stood for.

Location

RI Workplace is located in Saddle Brook, New Jersey just half hour from New York City. Our team has successfully completed projects all throughout the United States. This geographical reach allows us to be agile with our clients, ensuring we can meet their needs anywhere across the country.

Client Journey

Creating a new workplace is an exciting company achievement and a further opportunity for your team culture to thrive. From concept to completion, RI Workplace believes in providing clients with an enjoyable and seamless project journey.

Learn more

Our Services

RI Workplace believes in providing all the necessary services to make workplace transformation projects 100% easy and stress-free for our clients. With our expansive scope of services, you will have everything you need to create a space for success in the most seamless way possible.

Learn more

Our Workplace

Our workplace was designed with clients in mind. With a full library of samples, we welcome clients to visit our showroom to gain ideas and provide input for their very own project.

Learn more

Let’s work together

Ready to boost team culture and maximize productivity at your business?

Get in touch
